meta_title: Calibration Meaning: The 2026 Industrial Guide to ISO & NIST Compliance
meta_description: Inaccurate sensors cost manufacturers millions. Learn the operational meaning of calibration, ISO 17025 standards, and how Factory AI automates compliance.
title: Calibration Meaning in 2026: The Industrial Operator’s Guide to Precision, Traceability, and Compliance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Calibration Meaning in 2026: The Industrial Operator’s Guide to Precision, Traceability, and Compliance

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution hero image inside a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse maintenance technician (wearing safety glasses, a hard hat, and a high-visibility vest) is inspecting a large industrial pump motor. The technician is holding a ruggedized tablet in one hand (showing only the back of the device) and using a digital calibration tool on a sensor with the other hand. The background shows a clean, bustling factory floor with blurred conveyors and automated machinery. The lighting is professional and industrial, highlighting the precision of the work. No text or overlays in the image.
